text: John C. Bliss was an American educator and college administrator. He was educated at Cornell University with an A.B. in 1889. He served as president of what is now State University of New York at New Paltz from 1908 to 1923. ==References== Category:Cornell University alumni Category:State University of New York at New Paltz faculty Category:Presidents of campuses of the State University of New York Category:Year of birth missing Category:Year of death missing
title: John C. Bliss
